name: dowsing-machine
effect: Used by trainer outside of battle : Searches for hidden items.
short_effect: Use to find hidden items on the field. AKA Itemfinder.

flavor_text.black_white: It checks for unseen items in the area and makes noise and lights when it finds something.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It checks for unseen items in the area and makes noise and lights when it finds something.
